We are motivated by the inherent opportunities and challenges in developing a market that has good potential for continuous growth. Our goal is to make a difference wherever we are and whatever we are into. The difference might be lowering the cost burden to end users or improving the quality of healthcare delivered to compete in global markets. We specialize in providing services that enhance hospital performance and healthcare delivery. Our landmarks are prominent throughout the healthcare space in Nigeria. Our package includes Turnkey design of health facilities, Hospital Information System (HIS), management of healthcare facilities, procurement, training and installation of medical equipment, among many others.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales & Operations Assistant

Job Locations: Ilupeju and Lekki Phase 1 - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Purpose


	To support the day-to-day operations of the pharmaceutical store by assisting with sales, customer service, inventory management, and ensuring compliance with pharmacy regulations.
	The role combines frontline sales duties with back-end operational support to ensure smooth and efficient store performance.


Key Responsibilities
Sales & Customer Service:


	Greet customers and assist them in locating and purchasing pharmaceutical and non-pharmaceutical products.
	Provide product information, usage instructions (non-prescription items), and promote sales of healthcare items.
	Handle customer complaints or queries professionally and escalate issues as necessary.
	Process transactions using POS systems, handle cash, card, and digital payments accurately.


Operational Support:


	Assist in daily stock management – receiving deliveries, unpacking, labeling, and shelving products.
	Maintain accurate stock levels and assist in inventory audits and restocking processes.
	Monitor expiry dates of medications and ensure proper disposal or returns per store policies.
	Maintain cleanliness and organization of the store, including displays and storage areas.


Compliance & Documentation:


	Ensure that products are stored and displayed in compliance with pharmaceutical regulations.
	Support the pharmacist in maintaining records for controlled drugs, prescriptions, and other required documentation.


Team Collaboration:


	Coordinate with pharmacists, store managers, and other assistants to ensure smooth workflow.


Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)


	Customer satisfaction ratings
	Sales targets achievement
	Inventory accuracy
	Compliance with pharmacy regulations





Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / OND / Bachelor's Degree with 0-2 years of work experience.


Working Conditions:


	Standing for extended periods.
	Handling of medications and lifting boxes or inventory materials.
	May involve evening or weekend shifts, depending on store hours.


Salary
N80,000 - N150,000 / Month.

title: Job Openings at Pearlville School
content:
Pearlville School is a private boarding secondary school located in a conducive environment in Imo State.

We are recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the following positions below:

1.) Nursery and Primary School Teacher with English Language and Mathematics Degree as major

Job Location: Owerri, Imo
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
     

            
    




	Candidate must be highly qualified with first degree and exprienced in English Language or Mathematics
	Candidate must have worked in reputable private secondary school for a minimum of 5 years
	Candidate must be firm, passonate, committed, self motivated, versatile and kind.
	School is in a Conducive teaching environment.


Benefits


	Salary: N65,000 - N80,000 / month.
	Lunch is provided
	Renumeration is Competitive 
	Continuous professional training provided.


Application Closing Date: 30th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: pvsschool14@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

2.) Agricultural Science / Geography Teacher

Job Location: Avu - Owerri, Imo
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
Qualified Candidate should:


	Have a Degree in specified subject area

	Have taught in a standard secondary school
	Should be passionate and committed

	Renumeration is competitive
	Lunch provided
	Continuous professional training provided


Application Closing Date: 8th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: pvsschool14@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.


3.) English Language / Government / PHE Teacher

Job Location: Avu - Owerri, Imo

	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's / Master's Degree with 5-10 years of work experience.

title: Job Vacancies at Butterburst Global Foods
content:
Butterburst Global Foods is an ultra-modern chains of bakery with two leading brands in the bakery industry namely; Butterburst and Sosoft. We have currently opened a Grocery store named The Brands Superstores and looking for talented and highly creative professionals to join our team in taking the organization to the next level.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Production Manager

Jobb Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
     

            
    




	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor`s Degree with 4 - 6 years work experience.
	Professional food technologist or scientist with vast experience in bakery operations.
	Ability to provide hands-on expertise in bread and pastry production.
	Skills to relate with relevant regulatory authorities in the food sector.
	Ability to design and implement standard operational procedures.
	Proficient in Excel and other working tools.
	Excellent skill in overseeing all aspects of bakery operations, including production, sales, and personnel management.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 per month. 

Application Closing Date: 8th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info.butterburstbakery@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Baker & Pastry Chef

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor`s Degree, HND, OND, SSCE qualification with 1 - 10 years of work experience.
	Proficient in operating modern baking equipment
	Excellent mixing and baking skills
	Ability to work under production pressure and timely delivery of baked goods
	Consistently meet up with production target
	Consistently provide high quality baked goods.


Salary
N80,000 - N120,000 monthly. 

Application Closing Date: 8th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info.butterburstbakery@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Accountant

Job Location: Nigeria

Responsibilities


	To prepare and examine financial records
	To identify potential areas of opportunity and risk
	To provide solutions and ensure that financial records are accurate
	To ensure that all avenues for losses are blocked
	To ensure that financial and data risks are evaluated and that taxes are paid properly.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications and experience.


Salary
N200,000 - N300,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 12th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info.butterburstbakery@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Job Openings at Sales Force Consulting
content:
Sales Force Consulting is a specialist on human capital development through corporate trainings, personal coaching, capacity building and mentoring. We also have tremendous competence in developing marketing strategies; sales force management, HR management and general business consulting.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Medical Officer

Job Location: Onitsha, Anambra
Employment Type: Full-time

Main Duties and Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Provide professional-level medical support by carrying out medical services and activities within the limits of their capacity/authority as applicable.
	Work closely with other medical personnel to ensure the completion of effective and safe procedures.
	Follow up with patients after completing a surgery to determine its success to ensure recuperation.
	Responding to medical questions and providing clinical information.


Education, Qualifications & Experience


	Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery (MBBS)
	A minimum of two years post-NYSC work experience.


General Benefits


	Accommodation is available
	Other incentives is highly competitive


Application Closing Date: 15th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV to: salesforceconsultingng@gmail.com using “Medical Officer - Onitsha" as the subject of the email.

Note: Enquiries: 08120796570 (WhatsApp or Text message chats only).

 

 

2.) Medical Sales Representative

Job Location: Imo Territory - Imo or Lagos 2 Territory - Lagos
Interview Mode: Virtual / Physical

Responsibilities


	Initiate strategies that will lead to the company having an effective footprint of its product lines across all the open markets, labs, pharmacies, patent medicine vendors and institutions in the territory.
	Source for new customers and manage the relationships of existing clients, ensuring that the customers increase on a regular basis.
	Drive intelligence gathering for deeper knowledge of competitive activities and marketing strategies.
	Ensure reconciliation of customers’ accounts on a regular basis.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree / HND in the sciences like Human Anatomy, Biological Sciences, Biochemistry, Microbiology, Anatomy, Biology, Chemistry, Industrial Chemistry, etc.
	At least two years of medical sales experience.


Skill Set:


	Ability to work independently with little supervision.
	Business Acumen
	Attention to details
	Leadership skills
	Effective selling/detailing skills
	Communication competence


Other Conditions:


	They understand the rudiments of sales and the relationship management process.
	They must possess competence in detailing, clinical meeting presentations
	They must be very hardworking, target-oriented, with a high level of integrity and leadership skills to achieve set targets in the territory.
	Ideal candidates should presently reside and must have worked in the intended locations for at least two years.
	Must be aged less than 35 years
	Ability to drive vehicles is compulsory (Including possession of a valid license)
	Extensive knowledge of key clients and prospects, as well as the market dynamics of the territory, is compulsory.


Benefits


	Robust incentive and commissions structure.


Application Closing Date: 11th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send only their updated CV (PDF or Word) to: salesforceconsultingng@gmail.com using “Medical Sales Rep - (Imo State Territory or Lagos 2 Territory) as the subject of the email.

Note


	For more information, Text or WhatsApp 08120796570 for enquiries. No calls
	Only shortlisted candidates who meet the set criteria shall be contacted within two weeks.


 

 

3.) Internal Auditor

Job Location: Abakaliki, Ebonyi
Employment Type: Full-time
Interview Mode: Physical

Responsibilities


	Analyzing and evaluating accounting information, reports, data, etc for deviations.
	Review all financial transactions, including control management, to ensure total compliance.
	Regularly evaluate company operations to ensure they are in line with SOPs
	Determining internal audit scope and developing periodic audit plans
	Ensure the substantiation of all financial transactions evidenced by source documents.
	Initiate and maintain financial controls by preparing and recommending policies and procedures.
	Secure all source documents, keeping financial information confidential, ensuring the speedy and ease of retrieving them.


Qualifications


	Degree/HND in Accounting or Banking and Finance with strong financial skills.
	At least three years of work experience in the Internal Audit and Control function


Other Conditions:


	Use of Excel or an accounting software is required
	Resumption is immediate.
	Candidates should ensure they presently reside in Abakaliki or can easily procure accommodation.


Skill Set:


	Competence to record financial transactions
	Ability to develop and implement cost-saving measures
	Carry out effective internal controls.
	Ability to work independently with little supervision.
	Business Acumen
	Attention to detail required.
	Use of a computer.


Salary
N100,000 - N200,000 / Month.

Application Closing Date: 11th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: salesforceconsultingng@gmail.com using “Internal Auditor" as the subject of the email.

Note


	Only qualified candidates will be shortlisted
	Text or WhatsApp 08120796570 for enquiries. No calls.
